remarks: If an atom differs from its translation, the trace is an atom.  Equation above Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2012.)
statement:
trlat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlat.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlat.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( F e. T /\ ( F ` P ) =/= P ) ) -> ( R ` F ) e. A ) $.
